stories.text: The Meta company, known so far as Facebook, is currently developing a smartwatch that will be able to take photos and record videos. The Bloomberg news agency has published a photo of this new smart watch.
stories.title: Meta with your own smartwatch? Equipment caught in the photo

stories.text: Mark Zuckerberg announced in his last speech that Facebook is changing its name to Meta. Thus, he confirmed the reports that had been circulating on the Internet for some time.
stories.title: The company Facebook changes its name. Why Meta?
